By having more than one person using the [[String Light Formation]], the effects of the jutsu are amplified, making it so even weaker users can successfully entrap a stronger opponent if they have enough users.

Seventeen prospective Genin were able to use this technique to make it difficult for even [[Kakashi Hatake]] to move.

[[id:Tajū Isshi Tōjin]]
[[pl:Tajū Isshi Tōjin]]
[[ru:Построение Множественной Струны Света]]
